steps.title: Redesign
steps.content: When the order is not approved than it comes to Redesign

steps.title: Access Controll Level
steps.content: Customize Aceess Controll on Submitted Orders.Here you can edit the access control permission

steps.title: Submit
steps.content: This Tab allows you to submit the Order,which is completly design.

steps.content: In this section we can Edit supplier name and date of created draft

steps.title: Delete
steps.content: This section allows you to Delete the Order.
